document.full_text: yemen opposition parties asked gulf arab mediators on tuesday to spell out whether president ali abdullah saleh would hand over power early under their proposal to end the country's two-month-old crisis.
document.title: yemen opposition seeks details on gulf plan
lines_and_colors: yemen opposition parties asked gulf arab mediators on tuesday to spell out whether president ali abdullah saleh would hand over power early under their proposal to end the country's two-month-old crisis.
